explanation: [0-0] A young man with curly hair, wearing a red hoodie, is kneeling on a carpet in a living room. In front of him sits a little boy in red clothes. The man is holding a purple object in his right hand, his eyes looking down at the little boy. The boy has his hands on the carpet, his head turned to the right, looking at the purple object in the man's hand. A corner of a red sofa is visible in the background, and a chandelier above casts a warm yellow light.
